properties.title: Task Type
properties.shortDescription: A standard interface that allows the abstraction of any type of Tasks, facilitating working routines within a DAO. Tasks can be assigned to a specific Role, and easily combined with other Modules & Plugins to create Quests, Proposals, Bounties, and other custom use-cases.
properties.longDescription: Task Types are a standard interface that allows the abstraction of any type of Tasks, facilitating the creation of working routines within a Hub. Tasks can be assigned to a specific Role or to the entire community, and can be combined with other Modules and Plugins to create Onboarding Quests, Voting Rounds, Bounties, and other more granular use-cases.
